summary:
I'm a pragmatic software engineer who seeks to do things better and simpler. Currently working at bol.com in the Netherlands and completed the Bachelor of Software Engineering Degree with First class honors at University of Westminster, UK and pursuing my Masters in Big Data Analytics at Robert Gordon University UK.

Java, Spring Boot, Kubernetes,  React, AWS, Javascript, PHP, HTML/CSS, Angular, Hybrid Mobile Apps, and Android are the areas where I'm mostly enthusiastic in. I’m a believer in learning the fundamentals first, with a craving for software craftsmanship and clean coding. I'm Enthusiastic and capable of learning and adapting to new technologies and challenges.
